Q9: What other means of using data or obtaining feedback do you use that drives the success of your school? #MEMSPAchat
@tlyman1976 Bam, well said!

@DerekMAdams Great idea!  I'm stealing it if you don't mind

Q7: How often do you talk to students about the perceptions of your school? #MEMSPAchat
@DerekMAdams How are the surveys given to Kindergarteners?  Does someone read them to them and they can respond?
@btenniswood I'd love to help anytime!  Had some interest from our SCC Elem Principals as well.  Asking how to get involved @kathykish

BAM!!!

Q5: What mechanism do you use to obtain feedback from the teachers of your school? https://t.co/Arc0mbTpaW
Q6: What mechanism do you use to obtain feedback from the students of your school? #MEMSPAchat
@chieflearner06 Hello Mr. Johnson, glad you could make it!  Q5 just posted.
@btenniswood If there's ever a leader that we'd love to join in on chats and give expertise, its @btenniswood
@rachelrowley Always considering all stakeholders and making best decision based on needs of students and what's best for THEM!
@DerekMAdams Google Forms are so easy!  Love how the data is collected as well.
Q5: What mechanism do you use to obtain feedback from the teachers of your school? #MEMSPAchat
@tlyman1976 Google Forms are so easy.  Please you can just email out a link, put in on your website, text it to parents, etc...  Paperless!
@j_s_mayes Those formal surveys trough @SurveyMonkey Google Forms, etc... are so key!  Gives stakeholders a voice!!! #MEMSPAchat
@DerekMAdams Welcome Derek.  Q4 just posted...

QUESTION 4: 

Q4: What mechanism do you use to obtain feedback from the parents of your school? #MEMSPAchat
@tlyman1976 Formal surveys put it in writing and give you data to look over with other stakeholders.  Builds buy-in!
@j_s_mayes The personal survey's we ask parents and community is so important!
A3: @MobyMax data, Google Form surveys, Discipline records, and surveys about vision and sulture.  PTC survey data #MEMSPAchat
A2: Love sending survey to parents through a @RemindHQ text.  See the response spike immediately! #MEMSPAchat
@dawn_kennaugh Welcome Dawn!  Question 3 just posted.
@ifireup Yes, def learned that.  I try to be short and to the point.  Love sending parents survey links to phone through a @RemindHQ text
Q3: What kinds of data are used to determine the effectiveness of your school’s culture and/or programming? #MEMSPAchat
BAM!  Collaboration and PD happening on #MEMSPAchat right now.  Who's next to join us??? https://t.co/J93prOyIDD
Question 3 coming up on #MEMSPAchat...
@ifireup How do you get survey data?  Surveymonkey, google forms?
@j_s_mayes So true!  How often do you get actual survey data from staff or parents?  How about students?
@BarbElson Everything we absorb is data, so true!  Notes, notes notes!
@rachelrowley Staff and Parent surveys really help!  Getting that feedback gives us a better idea of how to make decisions and support
We know @btenniswood is out there lurking!  Hoping to crack the egg and jump in!
